rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0001
rows.name:
Meleph...
Is the Superbian army
excavating Aeshma again?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0002
rows.name:
No, the excavation has been on hold
since that incident.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0003
rows.name:
But there are still many people
from the Empire here.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0004
rows.name: Why don't they go back to Superbia?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0005
rows.name:
If we abandon the site,
the Iira faction might exploit it again.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0006
rows.name:
Even if we rebury
what's been dug up,
the same issue could occur again.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0007
rows.name: So we decided to manage this place.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0008
rows.name:
No to prevent it from falling into
anyone's hands, we've increased troop
numbers and deployed a Divine Beast ship.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0009
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0010
rows.name:
Tora wants to investigate
Aeshma a little!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0011
rows.name:
I've never seen Judicium
weapons before, so
I'm really curious about them.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0012
rows.name: I'm sorry, Tora

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0013
rows.name:
Because of our agreement
with the Kingdom of Invidia,
I can't allow that.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0014
rows.name:
We are forbidden from investigating,
researching, or utilizing Aeshma
in any way.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0015
rows.name: Meh-meh!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0016
rows.name: When did you make that kind of agreement?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0017
rows.name: At the recent summit meeting.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0018
rows.name:
So the consequences for almost
causing a war were severe.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0019
rows.name: That's about right...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0020
rows.name: What should I ask, meh?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0021
rows.name: Did you also pay reparations?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0022
rows.name: Did you give them sweet sausages?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0023
rows.name: Are there other promises too?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0101
rows.name:
We didn't end up paying reparations,
but it was definitely a possibility.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0102
rows.name:
The estimated amount
would have been around
40 billion G.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0103
rows.name: That's a lot, meh!?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0104
rows.name:
That's enough to build
around 1000 Hanas...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0105
rows.name: I didn't realize Hana was so costly...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0106
rows.name: Ahem, meh!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0107
rows.name:
So if it wasn't money,
what did Meleph's country
have to give up?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0201
rows.name: That's just what Master wants to eat.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0202
rows.name:
How many years' supply
would that have been?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0203
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0204
rows.name: I'd say around 100 million years' worth.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0205
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, you just made up a number
because you couldn't be bothered
to calculate it, didn't you...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0206
rows.name: What did Meleph country pay then?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0301
rows.name: That's quite astute of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0302
rows.name:
They must have demanded that
you share Superbia's technology.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0303
rows.name:
We certainly couldn't accept that,
so it was a different demand.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0304
rows.name: Masterpon, your guess is wrong this time.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0305
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0401
rows.name:
Invidia demanded survey rights
for Temperantia.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0402
rows.name: How is that useful?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0403
rows.name:
Although it's a buffer zone,
we ended up excavating Judicium's
Divine Beast weapon.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0404
rows.name:
Since they suspect there
might be other Divine Beast weapons
buried in Temperantia..

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0405
rows.name:
Invidia wants to get
their hands on similar weapons.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0406
rows.name:
That would give them
a powerful deterrent.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0407
rows.name:
Indeed, that's what
national defense
is all about.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0408
rows.name: Haah, what a bother.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0409
rows.name:
Tora doesn't care about complicated
stuff, he just wants to freely
experiment with the Divine Beast weapon.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0410
rows.name: Heh... That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0411
rows.name:
If only we and Invidia could approach
things as straightforwardly as you do,
Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0412
rows.name: Indeed... I'm quite envious.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0413
rows.name:
Masterpon,
they're calling you a simpleton.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0414
rows.name: Nobody said such a thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0415
rows.name:
If that's how it is, I'll use Judicium
technology to upgrade Hana's behavior
toward her Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0416
rows.name:
Please,
definitely don't do that.
